title: Lee Ki-je
text:
Lee Ki-je (; born July 9, 1991) is a South Korean <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player who plays for <a href="Suwon%20Samsung%20Bluewings">Suwon Samsung</a>.
International career.
He made his debut for <a href="South%20Korea%20national%20football%20team">South Korea national football team</a> on 5 June 2021 in a <a href="2022%20FIFA%20World%20Cup%20qualification%20%E2%80%93%20AFC%20Second%20Round">World Cup qualifier</a> against Turkmenistan.
Club statistics.
"As of 5 December 2021"
